entry.title: $2300 // No fee! Williamsburg apt- separate kitchen, living and king bedroom!
entry.content:
NO FEE - Real apartment pictures - $2300 monthly rent - Pets allowed (despite breed)
Move date Feb.1 or Feb.15 - Around the corner from the J/M/L/G trains
*100% pest free history

* I used a wide angle lens so if the kitchen or hallway look narrow in pictures they are NOT in person!

A real New York one bedroom apartment with an open door layout. This means there are open doorways throughout light to shine through the whole apartment!

When you walk in, you are in the kitchen which has large steel appliances and two large windows. Fire escape off the kitchen - great for plants! Energy sufficient heaters installed in the kitchen and the bedroom. Bathroom is off the kitchen. Follow the windowed hallway to the living room which has a bike closet, followed by a true king sized bedroom with two large windows, a closet and armoire (left by the last tenant which you're welcome to use, or we can scrap it). One flight walk-up. Garbage / Recycle bins are inside so no parkas to throw out trash outside.

Access to a furnished courtyard shared by a flower shop - great if you have a pup or love to host.
It's a 4 unit building so it's not a loud shared space.


Orange Tree Organic Market and 99Â¢ store at the corner
1 block from Graham Laundromat and around the corner from Sternberg Park!
Also near The Brooklyn Tree, The West, Roberta's, Sweet Silence, 19 Cafe, Cafe 28, Eastwick, Normans Kil, etc

$500 deposit to take it off the market
$50 application / credit check
We are flexible on credit
Guarantors allowed

Management is attentive, and the landlord is a family man who takes care of his tenants.

Talk soon!
Laura
show contact info

entry.title: $2675 // True 3 BED with 2 full BATHS/ Private Yard! L_M trains
entry.content:
Large true three bedroom apartment near the L-M Myrtle - Wycoff Stop ( 30 minutes to NYC)

This apartment has high ceilings, hardwood floors.
Two full bathrooms
Kitchen with stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and microwave.
Private yard.
Windows in every bedroom.
Hot water included.

Great location near shops, gyms, restaurants, bars and more.

Feel free to call for more information or to schedule an appointment show contact info.

entry.title: $2650 // NO FEE 3 BED APT, YARD Great Location L-M Trains
entry.content:
Great three bedroom apartment near the L - M stops (Wycoff - Myrtle) 25 minutes to NYC

This building is near shopping, laundry, gyms, bars, restaurants and more.

The apartment has a private yard, high ceilings, windows in every room. Closet space.

Stainless steel appliances.
